Fall Detection Research

March 2020 - January 2021

Real-time remote fall detection using Deep Neural Networks

This is my first research project using Machine Learning. I developed a fall detection system based on deep neural networks which runs inside the browser in real time. This project, which originally started as my bachelor's thesis, has been accepted for pubblication at CARE2020 ICPR's workshop. Below you will find the video presentation i made for the conference and the written explanation of how the system works.

Video presentation

How does it work
